actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to increase the monthly rates of dependency and indemnity compensation payable under the veterans' laws by 17 percent, and to increase the monthly rates of pension payable under such laws by 15 percent.

summary.text: Increases the monthly rates of dependency and indemnity compensation payable under the veterans' laws by 17 percent. Increases the monthly rates of pension payable under such laws by 15 percent.

titles.title: A bill to increase the monthly rates of dependency and indemnity compensation payable under the veterans' laws by 17 percent, and to increase the monthly rates of pension payable under such laws by 15 percent.
